subject: From: Barrister/Lawyer Larry
body:

Attention Please,
Thanks for your email, if you want us to transfer your fund to your account right now, Please comply immediately,  I will use my power to transfer your fund into your account. Please reconfirm us your full account details and your Passport Or Id Card/ Home address. Note that the fee for the transfer is $125USD and that will cover up everything's/ All Document. Remember only fee you will pay to receive payment of $1.7 million USD United States Dollars We do accept ITUNES GIFT CARD Or GOOGLE PLAY CARD Or STEAM GIFT CARD OR AMAZON GIFT CARD, you can send it via email. You can send us fee $125 USD to our BITCOIN WALLET BELOW: 1D1wUo3hzFerXgbrFtX471EBa16Knx3j3c
YOU ARE ADVICE TO SEND US THE FEE BY WESTERN UNION OR MONEYGRAM OR RIA WITH THE BELOW DETAILS:

Lawyer Larry Lewandowski

llewandowski445@aol.com

subject: Re:   From: Barrister/Lawyer Larry
body:
Hello Lawyer Larry,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your offer to transfer the funds into my account. However, before proceeding, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please provide more information about the fee for the transfer? What does it cover exactly?

2. You mentioned accepting ITUNES GIFT CARD, GOOGLE PLAY CARD, STEAM GIFT CARD, or AZON GIFT CARD as payment. Is there a specific reason why these gift cards are preferred over other forms of payment?

3. Can you explain how sending the fee via email works? Is there a specific email address I should use?

4. In regards to the Bitcoin wallet you mentioned, could you provide more details on how to send the fee using this method?

I look forward to your response and further clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Frank
